Description: Body sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery chalice; white slip; interior glazed streaky black; exterior: painted decoration consisting of sphinx standing to left (part of wing with added red patch, parts of forelegs and dotted underbelly with red remaining).
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.0420) (phase 2)
